item.title: 金融资产定价
item.description: Black-Scholes option pricing model European call option : $$ C = S_0N(d_1)-Ke^{-rT}N(d_2) $$ $$ d_1 = \frac{1}{\sigma\sqrt{T}}[\ln{\frac{S_0}{K}+(r+\frac{1}{2}\sigma^2)T}] $$ $$ d_2 = d_1 -\sigma\sqrt{T} $$
